name: MLFeatureValue.ImageOption
desc: The initializer options you use to crop and scale an image when creating an image feature value.

items.name: static let cropRect: MLFeatureValue.ImageOption
items.desc: The option you use to crop an image when creating an image feature value.

items.name: static let cropAndScale: MLFeatureValue.ImageOption
items.desc: The option you use to crop and scale an image when creating an image feature value.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates an image feature option key from a string.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an image feature option key from a raw value string.
